availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: At a call county court March 20th 1862 A W Foster Sheriff of Allen County Kentucky having failed to execute Bond for collection of the Revenue tax of Said County for the year 1862. as required by law it is therefore adjudged by the court that his office be and is hereby vacated and that John H. Murry be and is hereby appointed Sheriff of Allen County for the unexpired term of the office of Said A W Foster Sheriff as aforesaid.
A Copy attest Samuel Carpenter clk.^protem^ a. c. c.
you will please have Sheriffs commission forwarded on as Soon as possible as he cannot act until he is commissioned
S. Carpenter c. l. k. protem
